wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Jennings MRBS (born 24 September 1966) is an English sculptor and a member of the Royal British Society of Sculptors.

response: A statue of Squadron Leader Pujji, by English sculptor Douglas Jennings, was unveiled by Air Vice-Marshal Edward Stringer in St Andrew's Gardens, Gravesend, on 28 November 2014. It bears the inscription: "To commemorate those from around the world who served alongside Britain in all conflicts 1914-2014". The Gravesend community, which has one of the largest gurdwaras in the UK, raised £70,000 for the statue in a month.
